name: stick
effect: Held by Farfetch’d: Raises the holder’s critical hit counter by 2.
short_effect: Raises Farfetch’d’s critical hit ratio by two stages.

flavor_text.sun_moon: An item to be held by Farfetch’d. This very long and stiff stalk of leek boosts its critical-hit ratio.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: An item to be held by Farfetch’d. This very long and stiff stalk of leek boosts its critical-hit ratio.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: An item to be held by Farfetch’d. This very long and stiff stalk of leek boosts its critical-hit ratio.
